name: vestige_009: splinter foam
description: [automatically generated transcript follows] --- so you see it is the mind of the person, not the follower, that we seek to understand. If we wish to understand the mind of pre-death humans, we must learn the interpretation for these phenomena that they believed at the time. For example, the splinter foam we now know to merely be a sort of trickle of mind, a hint of intention, coming from the Dead God. Though our ancestors were not wrong in their so-called "physical" explanation of this phenomena, their science did not let them commune. However, understanding why they persisted with this belief is why we're here today! So open your textbooks to page 16 and let's get started. --- [transcript end]
